hotels.title: Modern Bremen City Stay near Historic Old Town & Central Train Station with Lobby Bar
hotels.description: Discover effortless city living at Aparthotel Adagio Bremen, your home away from home in the heart of northern Germany. Retreat to a modern, fully-equipped studio or apartment, complete with a fully equipped kitchen - perfect for whipping up your favourite meals after a day of exploration. Discover insider tips and local favourites from the 24-reception staff and return in the evening to enjoy a glass of local beer in the cosy lobby bar. Just a short 10-minute walk from the hotel lies Bremen's historic Market Square and UNESCO World Heritage-listed Town Hall, where you can soak up the city's medieval charm. The buzzing Schnoor Quarter, with its narrow lanes and quirky shops, is also just a few minutes away, while excellent tram connections put the rest of Bremen at your fingertips.
